1: לְדָוִ֨ד ׀ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> רִיבָ֣ה <sup>7378 </sup> <n>Plead</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[my cause] O LORD</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יְרִיבַ֑י <sup>3401 </sup> <n>with them that strive</n> לְ֝חַ֗ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>with me fight</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> לֹֽחֲמָֽי׃ <sup>3898 </sup> <n>against them that fight</n>
2: הַחֲזֵ֣ק <sup>2388 </sup> <n>Take hold</n> מָגֵ֣ן <sup>4043 </sup> <n>of shield</n> וְצִנָּ֑ה <sup>6793 </sup> <n>and buckler</n> וְ֝ק֗וּמָה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>and stand up</n> בְּעֶזְרָתִֽי׃ <sup>5833 </sup> <n>for mine help</n>
3: וְהָ֘רֵ֤ק <sup>7324 </sup> <n>Draw out</n> חֲנִ֣ית <sup>2595 </sup> <n>also the spear</n> וּ֭סְגֹר <sup>5462 </sup> <n>and stop</n> לִקְרַ֣את <sup>7125 </sup> <n>[the way] against</n> רֹדְפָ֑י <sup>7291 </sup> <n>them that persecute</n> אֱמֹ֥ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>me say</n> לְ֝נַפְשִׁ֗י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>unto my soul</n> יְֽשֻׁעָתֵ֥ךְ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>I [am] thy salvation</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n>
4: יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>Let them be confounded</n> וְיִכָּלְמוּ֮ <sup>3637 </sup> <n>and put to shame</n> מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <sup>1245 </sup> <n>that seek</n> נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>after my soul</n> יִסֹּ֣גוּ <sup>5472 </sup> <n>let them be turned</n> אָח֣וֹר <sup>268 </sup> <n>back</n> וְיַחְפְּר֑וּ <sup>2659 </sup> <n>and brought to confusion</n> חֹ֝שְׁבֵ֗י <sup>2803 </sup> <n>that devise</n> רָעָתִֽי׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>my hurt</n>
5: יִֽהְי֗וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>them be like</n> כְּמֹ֥ץ <sup>4671 </sup> <n>Let them be as chaff</n> לִפְנֵי־ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> ר֑וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>the wind</n> וּמַלְאַ֖ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>and let the angel</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> דּוֹחֶֽה׃ <sup>1760 </sup> <n>chase</n>
6: יְֽהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>Let</n> דַרְכָּ֗ם <sup>1870 </sup> <n>Let their way</n> חֹ֥שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>be dark</n> וַחֲלַקְלַקּ֑וֹת <sup>2519 </sup> <n>and slippery</n> וּמַלְאַ֥ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>and let the angel</n> יְ֝הוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> רֹדְפָֽם׃ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>persecute</n>
7: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> חִנָּ֣ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>For without cause</n> טָֽמְנוּ־ <sup>2934 </sup> <n>have they hid</n> לִ֭י שַׁ֣חַת <sup>7845 </sup> <n>[in] a pit</n> רִשְׁתָּ֑ם <sup>7568 </sup> <n>for me their net</n> חִ֝נָּ֗ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>[which] without cause</n> חָפְר֥וּ <sup>2658 </sup> <n>they have digged</n> לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>for my soul</n>
8: תְּבוֹאֵ֣הוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> שׁוֹאָה֮ <sup>7722 </sup> <n>Let destruction</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵ֫דָ֥ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>acknowledge</n> וְרִשְׁתּ֣וֹ <sup>7568 </sup> <n>and let his net</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> טָמַ֣ן <sup>2934 </sup> <n>that he hath hid</n> תִּלְכְּד֑וֹ <sup>3920 </sup> <n>catch</n> בְּ֝שׁוֹאָ֗ה <sup>7722 </sup> <n>himself into that very destruction</n> יִפָּל־ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>let him fall</n> בָּֽהּ׃
9: וְ֭נַפְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>And my soul</n> תָּגִ֣יל <sup>1523 </sup> <n>shall be joyful</n> בַּיהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> תָּ֝שִׂישׂ <sup>7797 </sup> <n>it shall rejoice</n> בִּישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>in his salvation</n>
10: כָּ֥ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> עַצְמוֹתַ֨י ׀ <sup>6106 </sup> <n>All my bones</n> תֹּאמַרְנָה֮ <sup>559 </sup> <n>shall say</n> יְהוָ֗ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>LORD</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> כָ֫מ֥וֹךָ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>is like</n> מַצִּ֣יל <sup>5337 </sup> <n>who [is] like unto thee which deliverest</n> עָ֭נִי <sup>6041 </sup> <n>the poor</n> מֵחָזָ֣ק <sup>2389 </sup> <n>from him that is too strong</n> מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>is too</n> וְעָנִ֥י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>for him yea the poor</n> וְ֝אֶבְי֗וֹן <sup>34 </sup> <n>and the needy</n> מִגֹּזְלֽוֹ׃ <sup>1497 </sup> <n>from him that spoileth</n>
11: יְ֭קוּמוּן <sup>6965 </sup> <n>did rise up</n> עֵדֵ֣י <sup>5707 </sup> <n>witnesses</n> חָמָ֑ס <sup>2555 </sup> <n>FALSE</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָ֝דַ֗עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>[things] that I knew</n> יִשְׁאָלֽוּנִי׃ <sup>7592 </sup> <n>they laid to my charge</n>
12: יְשַׁלְּמ֣וּנִי <sup>7999 </sup> <n>They rewarded</n> רָ֭עָה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>me evil</n> תַּ֥חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>Thahash</n> טוֹבָ֗ה <sup>2896 </sup> <n>for good</n> שְׁכ֣וֹל <sup>7908 </sup> <n>[to] the spoiling</n> לְנַפְשִֽׁי׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>of my soul</n>
13: וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <sup>589 </sup> <n>Me</n> בַּחֲלוֹתָ֡ם <sup>2470 </sup> <n>But as for me when they were sick</n> לְב֬וּשִׁי <sup>3830 </sup> <n>my clothing</n> שָׂ֗ק <sup>8242 </sup> <n>[was] sackcloth</n> עִנֵּ֣יתִי <sup>6031 </sup> <n>I humbled</n> בַצּ֣וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>with fasting</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> וּ֝תְפִלָּתִ֗י <sup>8605 </sup> <n>and my prayer</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> חֵיקִ֥י <sup>2436 </sup> <n>into mine own bosom</n> תָשֽׁוּב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>returned</n>
14: כְּרֵֽעַ־ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>myself as though [he had been] my friend</n> כְּאָ֣ח <sup>251 </sup> <n>[or] brother</n> לִ֭י הִתְהַלָּ֑כְתִּי <sup>1980 </sup> <n>I behaved</n> כַּאֲבֶל־ <sup>57 </sup> <n>as one that mourneth</n> אֵ֝֗ם <sup>517 </sup> <n>[for his] mother</n> קֹדֵ֥ר <sup>6937 </sup> <n>heavily</n> שַׁחֽוֹתִי׃ <sup>7817 </sup> <n>I bowed down</n>
15: וּבְצַלְעִי֮ <sup>6761 </sup> <n>But in mine adversity</n> שָׂמְח֪וּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>they rejoiced</n> וְֽנֶאֱ֫סָ֥פוּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>and gathered themselves together</n> נֶאֶסְפ֬וּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>gathered themselves together</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> נֵ֭כִים <sup>5222 </sup> <n>[yea] the abjects</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> יָדַ֑עְתִּי <sup>3045 </sup> <n>against me and I knew</n> קָֽרְע֥וּ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>[it] not they did tear</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>without</n> דָֽמּוּ׃ <sup>1826 </sup> <n>[me] and ceased</n>
16: בְּ֭חַנְפֵי <sup>2611 </sup> <n>With hypocritical</n> לַעֲגֵ֣י <sup>3934 </sup> <n>mockers</n> מָע֑וֹג <sup>4580 </sup> <n>in feasts</n> חָרֹ֖ק <sup>2786 </sup> <n>they gnashed</n> עָלַ֣י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> שִׁנֵּֽימוֹ׃ <sup>8127 </sup> <n>upon me with their teeth</n>
17: אֲדֹנָי֮ <sup>136 </sup> <n>Lord</n> כַּמָּ֪ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>how</n> תִּ֫רְאֶ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>how long wilt thou look on</n> הָשִׁ֣יבָה <sup>7725 </sup> <n>? rescue</n> נַ֭פְשִׁי <sup>5315 </sup> <n>my soul</n> מִשֹּׁאֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>7722 </sup> <n>from their destructions</n> מִ֝כְּפִירִ֗ים <sup>3715 </sup> <n>from the lions</n> יְחִידָתִֽי׃ <sup>3173 </sup> <n>my darling</n>
18: א֭וֹדְךָ <sup>3034 </sup> <n>I will give thee thanks</n> בְּקָהָ֣ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>congregation</n> רָ֑ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>in the great</n> בְּעַ֖ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> עָצ֣וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>thee among much</n> אֲהַֽלְלֶֽךָּ׃ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>cheer up</n>
19: לִ֣י אֹיְבַ֣י <sup>341 </sup> <n>Let not them that are mine enemies</n> שֶׁ֑קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>wrongfully</n> שֹׂנְאַ֥י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>that hate</n> חִ֝נָּ֗ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>me without a cause</n> יִקְרְצוּ־ <sup>7169 </sup> <n>over me [neither] let them wink</n> עָֽיִן׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>with the eye</n>
20: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁל֗וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>not peace</n> יְדַ֫בֵּ֥רוּ <sup>1696 </sup> <n>For they speak</n> וְעַ֥ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> רִגְעֵי־ <sup>7282 </sup> <n>against [them that are] quiet</n> אֶ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the land</n> דִּבְרֵ֥י <sup>1697 </sup> <n>matters</n> מִ֝רְמוֹת <sup>4820 </sup> <n>deceitful</n> יַחֲשֹׁבֽוּן׃ <sup>2803 </sup> <n>but they devise</n>
21: וַיַּרְחִ֥יבוּ <sup>7337 </sup> <n>wide</n> עָלַ֗י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> פִּ֫יהֶ֥ם <sup>6310 </sup> <n>Yea they opened their mouth</n> אָ֭מְרוּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>against me [and] said</n> הֶאָ֣ח ׀ <sup>1889 </sup> <n>Aha</n> הֶאָ֑ח <sup>1889 </sup> <n>aha</n> רָאֲתָ֥ה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>hath seen</n> עֵינֵֽינוּ׃ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>our eye</n>
22: רָאִ֣יתָה <sup>7200 </sup> <n>[This] thou hast seen</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> אַֽל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תֶּחֱרַ֑שׁ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>keep not silence</n> אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <sup>136 </sup> <n>O Lord</n> אֲל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּרְחַ֥ק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>be not far</n> מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n>
23: הָעִ֣ירָה <sup>5782 </sup> <n>Stir up</n> וְ֭הָקִיצָה <sup>6974 </sup> <n>thyself and awake</n> לְמִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>to my judgment</n> אֱלֹהַ֖י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> וַֽאדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>and my Lord</n> לְרִיבִֽי׃ <sup>7379 </sup> <n>[even] unto my cause</n>
24: שָׁפְטֵ֣נִי <sup>8199 </sup> <n>Judge</n> כְ֭צִדְקְךָ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>according to thy righteousness</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> אֱלֹהָ֗י <sup>430 </sup> <n>my God</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יִשְׂמְחוּ־ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and let them not rejoice</n> לִֽי׃
25: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Let them not say</n> בְ֭לִבָּם <sup>3820 </sup> <n>in their hearts</n> הֶאָ֣ח <sup>1889 </sup> <n>Ah</n> נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>so would we have it</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יֹ֝אמְר֗וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>let them not say</n> בִּֽלַּעֲנֽוּהוּ׃ <sup>1104 </sup> <n>We have swallowed him up</n>
26: יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>Let them be ashamed</n> וְיַחְפְּר֨וּ ׀ <sup>2659 </sup> <n>and brought to confusion</n> יַחְדָּו֮ <sup>3162 </sup> <n>together</n> שְׂמֵחֵ֪י <sup>8056 </sup> <n>that rejoice</n> רָעָ֫תִ֥י <sup>7451 </sup> <n>at mine hurt</n> יִֽלְבְּשׁוּ־ <sup>3847 </sup> <n>let them be clothed</n> בֹ֥שֶׁת <sup>1322 </sup> <n>with shame</n> וּכְלִמָּ֑ה <sup>3639 </sup> <n>and dishonour</n> הַֽמַּגְדִּילִ֥ים <sup>1431 </sup> <n>that magnify</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n>
27: יָרֹ֣נּוּ <sup>7442 </sup> <n>Let them shout for joy</n> וְיִשְׂמְחוּ֮ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and be glad</n> חֲפֵצֵ֪י <sup>2655 </sup> <n>that favour</n> צִ֫דְקִ֥י <sup>6664 </sup> <n>my righteous cause</n> וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>yea let them say</n> תָ֭מִיד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> יִגְדַּ֣ל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>be magnified</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Let the LORD</n> הֶ֝חָפֵ֗ץ <sup>2655 </sup> <n>which hath pleasure</n> שְׁל֣וֹם <sup>7965 </sup> <n>in the prosperity</n> עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>of his servant</n>
28: וּ֭לְשׁוֹנִי <sup>3956 </sup> <n>And my tongue</n> תֶּהְגֶּ֣ה <sup>1897 </sup> <n>shall speak</n> צִדְקֶ֑ךָ <sup>6664 </sup> <n>of thy righteousness</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַ֝יּוֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>all the day</n> תְּהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>8416 </sup> <n>[and] of thy praise</n>
